participant_1.background:
My hobbies include reading and cycling.
I spend the weekends travelling up to canada to relax and enjoy the view.
I hope to someday compete professionally or atleast qualify for an event.
I am the general manager of the local grocery store.

participant_2.background:
I have one blue eye and one hazel eye.
My mom is an osteopath.
I am a cat owner.
I speak fluent italian.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks. How are you?
I'm doing good as well. I like your profile. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, cycle, and travel. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to read, too. My favorite book is The Great Gatsby. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is To Kill a Mockingbird. I love the way Harper Lee tells the story.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a classic for a reason.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to cycle, too. I find it's a great way to relax and get some exercise.
I agree. I love cycling. I've been doing it for years.
Where do you like to cycle?
I like to cycle around my neighborhood and in the park. I also like to go on long bike rides in the country.
I love cycling in the country. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I agree. It's a great way to escape the city and get some fresh air.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to travel. I love visiting new places and experiencing different cultures.
I agree. Traveling is one of the best ways to learn about the world.
I have been to Canada a few times. I love the scenery and the people.
I've never been to Canada. I'd love to go one day.
You should. It's a beautiful country.
I'm sure it is. I've heard good things about it.
